snippet.title: Aaron vs. Ruth: Battle of the Big Bats (PC) - Gameplay
snippet.description:
A full game of Aaron vs. Ruth: Battle of the Big Bats, a 1997 PC baseball game. Bambinos vs. Hammers, this, like every game in Aaron vs. Ruth, is a match-up of two all-time teams mixing different eras of baseball. 

Unknowingly I had set all substitutions to be automatic, so a few times I mess around in the menu trying to warm up a reliever or pinch hit for my pitcher to no avail. The CPU decided that Warren Spahn should get a chance to finish the shutout, I guess.

More info on the 30-30.club baseball game encyclopedia here: https://30-30.club/index.php/wiki/aaron-vs-ruth-battle-of-the-big-bats/
